scripts.fix-protobuf: sed -i 's#var global = Function('\''return this'\'')();#var global = (function() { return this || window || global || self; }).call(null);#g' ./asset-pipeline/api_pb.js
scripts.start: npm run protoc && npm run fix-protobuf && parcel watch ./asset-pipeline/index.ts --no-hmr --public-url /auth/static
scripts.release: npm run protoc && npm run fix-protobuf && parcel build ./asset-pipeline/index.ts --public-url /auth/static
